name: BFK WARZONE
description:
BFK WARZONE is a Simple 2D Hero Shooter Multiplayer Matchmaking Game with a complex ecosystem powered by the fortis as in-game Hero Characters with one mission to protect the fort from aliens. The game hosts many modes and allows players to earn and rank while advancing in the warzone.

Play the Game by visiting: https://marketplace.bfkwarzone.com

or Find it on Google Play & Apple & Huawei
